text: National Highway 83 (NH 83) was a former National Highway in India entirely within the state of Bihar. NH 83 linked state capital, Patna (of Bihar) to Dobhi on former National Highway 2 (new NH 19) and passed through Jehanabad, Gaya and Bodhgaya. The total length of NH 83 was about . Details of National Highways in India-Source-Govt. of India After renumbering of national highways, new National Highway 83 is now located in the state of Tamil Nadu. == See also == * National Highway * List of National Highways * National Highways Development Project == References == ==External links== * Route map of NH 83 83 Category:National highways in India (old numbering)
title: National Highway 83 (India, old numbering)
